name: YKnytt
description:
An open source implementation of Nifflas' atmospheric platformer, Knytt Stories.

Currently it features some quality-of-life improvements over the original including dynamic screen resizing, keybinding, user-settings, 2d positional audio, and more yet to come.

It is still a rather early work in progress, but the tutorial is feature complete and much of the main game is playable. User-made levels can be loaded, but there are many objects that are still being implemented.

Source code can be found at Github.
